name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closer - Auto Chat for Tinder and Bumble

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closer is a extension that helps women automatically chat on dating apps like Tinder and Bumble.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Closer is a plugin that helps women automatically chat on dating apps like Tinder and Bumble and determine whether the other person is a Playboy or a Serious Dater.
